title: Can't even enjoy hexakill
body:
4 toxic people on my team
trash talking since 10seconds in

Saying things like "fk you your trash, reported.

Said 3 things all game.

"gj"
" i can't help you if you run from me=/"
and 
"if we stick together instead of goign 2v4 and 3v5 we can come back!"

Can't even enjoy a new mode because of ragers(who ironically were feeding relatively hard)
